scripts.predev: yarn run eslint:fix && yarn run tsc:prebuild && node prebuild 2>&1 | tee dist/log.beta.prebuild.txt
scripts.dev: yarn run tsc:build && node build/index 2>&1 | tee dist/log.beta.build.txt
scripts.postdev: yarn run tsc:docs && vuepress build docs 2>&1 | tee dist/log.beta.docs.txt
scripts.prebuild: yarn run eslint:fix && yarn run tsc:prebuild && node prebuild production 2>&1 | tee dist/log.stable.prebuild.txt
scripts.build: yarn run tsc:build && node build/index production 2>&1 | tee dist/log.stable.build.txt
scripts.postbuild: yarn run tsc:docs && vuepress build docs 2>&1 | tee dist/log.stable.docs.txt
scripts.eslint:report: yarn run order-json && eslint docs/.vuepress/ static/ prebuild/ build/ src/ --ext .js,.vue -f table --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern 2>&1 | tee dist/log.eslint.report.txt
scripts.eslint:fix: yarn run order-json && eslint docs/.vuepress/ static/ prebuild/ build/ src/ --ext .js,.vue -f table --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern --fix 2>&1 | tee dist/log.eslint.fix.txt
scripts.order-json: jsonsort -t tsconfig.json docs/* static/* prebuild/* build/* src/*  2>&1 | tee dist/log.jsonsort.txt

userscript.name: LSS-Manager V.4
userscript.author: Aisaka | Sanni | Jan (jxn_30)
